venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Trivia is held every Thurs. at Chuck's in Auburn. Teams are comprised of roughly six people. An emcee reads a question,then each team submits an answer,bidding a certain number of points each time, depending on confidence level. The team with the most points wins a gift certificate.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a small meetup sign. Also, I will give out cell number closer to the event.
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's Steak House
